items.title: Taylor 'more likely now' to exit Celtic in summer - Rodgers
items.description: Celtic manager Brendan Rodgers says Greg Taylor is "more likely now" to move this summer after the left-back again missed out on game time in a 3-0 win over Heart of Midlothian.

items.title: Jeffrey Schlupp open to prospect of Celtic return as Greg Taylor nears Parkhead exit
items.description: Crystal Palace left-back Jeffrey Schlupp has admitted he is open to the possibility of returning to Celtic after his loan deal runs out in the summer.

items.title: 'Much rather see us go for the game': Critchley defends Hearts’ approach at Parkhead

items.title: Celtic fans protest 'repression' outside Glasgow police station
items.description: Ultras were spotted on Saturday afternoon outside London Road Police Station with signs reading 'fans against criminalisation'. It comes after the group claimed that officers showed 'criminalisation' and 'repression' against Hoops fans earlier this month.
